title: Corporate Training, NYC Workshop, and Book Update
description:
I'm afraid I ran out of time for Friday Q&A this week. Will shoot for next week instead. Instead, I present a little update about various other things in my world.
(Read More)

title: GIPHY @ MHACKS X
description: GIPHY is a proud sponsor of University of Michigan's 2017 MHACKS X. A 36 hour hackathon where teams work together to build, code or design projects, aka hacks. GIPHY representatives who will participate in the fun and help pick winners for the best use of the GIPHY API - exciting stuff!
